title: Tales from the Riverbank
overview: In this series, Clare Balding tells the stories of Britain's most iconic rivers, looking into the glorious sights and sounds of the river and its inhabitants. From the wildlife that call it home, to the folk who live and work on the riverbank, to the many day trippers and pleasure seekers enjoying its waters. Along the way, Clare stops off at famous landmarks and attractions, as well as sampling plenty of local delicacies.
